LanguageData.MedicalPotency.label: 薬効
LanguageData.MedicalPotency.description: How effective this is when used to tend wounds and diseases, or do surgery. Higher medical potency improves the quality of tending, and acts as a multiplier on the chance of success during surgery. Medical potency is just one factor in medical outcomes, among many others, including doctor ability, equipment, cleanliness, and luck.
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.label: medical tend quiality maximum
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.description: The maximum quality of medical tending that can be achieved while using this. Better tend quality allows skilled doctors to treat wounds better, as well as more reliably.
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.label: constrution speed
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.description: The speed at which buildings made of this are constructed is multiplied by this value. Some materials, like stone, are slow to build from, while others, like wood, are fast.
